narrative.title: 2Nd New Zealand Division - 1942Q4
narrative.situation: British Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q4.
narrative.objectives: Elite combined-arms infantry division with organic armoured brigade (from October 1942). Capable of independent operations with strong artillery support and mobile reserves.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Effective anti-tank defense with increased 6-pounder allocation
Veteran troops with extensive desert warfare experience
